results.title: Bullet for My Valentine Scream Aim Fire DVD Conent
results.original_title: Bullet for My Valentine Scream Aim Fire DVD Conent
results.overview: Videos:  Scream Aim Fire  Waking the Demon  Hearts Burst into Fire  Bullet TV:  Drinking  Switzerland  Japan  Travel to Oz  Australia/New Zealand

results.title: Reformation, Plague and Fire in Renaissance London
results.original_title: Reformation, Plague and Fire in Renaissance London
results.overview: Reformation, Plague and Fire in Renaissance London. The Tudor Reformation saw the destruction of dozens of London's oldest and largest ecclesiastical structures. But during the tumultuous days of the Reformation, Civil War, and Restoration, the city grew by leaps and bounds. The bubonic plague returned in 1665. No sooner had the city recovered, than the Great Fire of 1666 reduced London to ashes.

results.title: Peppa Pig: The Fire Engine and Other Stories
results.original_title: Peppa Pig: The Fire Engine and Other Stories
results.overview: Peppa is a lovable, cheeky little piggy who lives with her younger brother George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig. Peppa loves playing games, dressing up, visiting exciting places and making new friends, but her absolutely favourite thing is jumping up and down in muddy puddles. Her adventures always end happily with loud snorts of laughter.

results.title: Father of Four: Songs from the Heart
results.original_title: Far til Fire - Sange fra Hjertet
results.overview: Original songs and video clips from the movies Father of Four.

results.title: Arcade Fire - Live At Oxegen Festival
results.original_title: Arcade Fire - Live At Oxegen Festival

results.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force: Vol. 3: Fire Heart
results.original_title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force: Vol. 3: Fire Heart
results.overview: This disc includes the following episodes: "Fire Heart," "Petrified Xander" and "Scaredy Cat." Also included is the bonus episode "Ranger Down."

results.title: Steel of Fire Warriors 2010 A.D.
results.original_title: Steel of Fire Warriors 2010 A.D.
results.overview: First the world was normal, everyone was happy. Then, the apocalypse happened and everything changed. Politics failed. Civilization fell into disarray. Out of the muck of this primordial devastation rose the hideous, deformed and evil Mutantzoids destroying everything in sight with their horrible mutant powers and appearances. None would stand in their swath of destruction, with the possible exception of... STEEL OF FIRE WARRIORS 2010 A.D. Written by Kevin Clarke

results.title: Cult of Luna - Fire Was Born
results.original_title: Cult of Luna - Fire Was Born
results.overview: Fire Was Born is the first DVD release by the Umeå post-metal band Cult of Luna. It features an entire live performance, the three music videos, and an interview with guitarist/vocalist Johannes Persson and keyboardist Anders Teglund, in which they answer fan-submitted questions.

results.title: Escape Fire: The Fight to Rescue American Healthcare
results.original_title: Escape Fire: The Fight to Rescue American Healthcare
results.overview: Our healthcare system is broken. Potent forces fight to maintain the status quo in a medical industry created for quick fixes, rather than prevention; for profit-driven, rather than patient-driven, care. Healthcare is at the center of an intense political firestorm in our nation's capital. But the current battle over cost and access does not ultimately address the root of the problem: we have a disease-care system, not a health-care one. After decades of opposition, a movement to introduce innovative high-touch, low-cost methods of prevention and healing is finally gaining ground.

results.title: Earth, Wind & Fire: The Collection
results.original_title: Earth, Wind & Fire: The Collection
results.overview: Blending rhythm and blues, funk, soul and disco, Earth, Wind & Fire has electrified audiences worldwide since the 1970s. This incandescent compilation rounds up videos and performance footage from the band's entire career, ranging from an update of 1978's "September" to later hits such as "Magnetic." Other tracks include "Serpentine Fire," "Boogie Wonderland" and live versions of "Fantasy," "Sing a Song" and the smash "After the Love Has Gone."

results.title: After The Fire - Live at the Greenbelt
results.original_title: After The Fire - Live at the Greenbelt
results.overview: After performing at the legendary Greenbelt Arts Festival in 1979, After The Fire return 25 years later marking their return with this live performance. Originally filmed as a private recording of the event, they decided to release the show on DVD.

results.title: Heat Wave
results.original_title: Heat Wave
results.overview: When a sudden, unexplained rise in local temperatures threatens to turn Los Angeles County into a parched, lifeless desert, one scientist must put her theories to the test in a desperate effort to prevent the catastrophe.

results.title: Earth, Wind & Fire: Live by Request
results.original_title: Earth, Wind & Fire: Live by Request
results.overview: Broadcast live at July 17th 1999 on A&E Network from Sony Music Studios in New York

results.title: Manowar: Hell On Earth II, Fire and Blood
results.original_title: Manowar: Hell On Earth II, Fire and Blood
results.overview: Fire and Blood is a double-DVD from American heavy metal band Manowar. The first DVD is a documentary that features part 2 of the series "Hell on Earth". With almost two hours of running time "Hell on Earth Part 2" documents the 1998 "Hell on Stage" European Tour with almost 30 shows. The second DVD, Blood in Brazil is their live performance at the Philips Monsters Of Rock in São Paulo, Brazil on September 26, 1998. This was the first a complete concert performance captured in the band's career.

results.title: Fire and Ice: The Rocket Richard Riot
results.original_title: Fire and Ice: The Rocket Richard Riot
results.overview: A documentary on the Canadian ice hockey legend Maurice Richard.

results.title: Santa Cruz Skateboards - Streets On Fire
results.original_title: Santa Cruz Skateboards - Streets On Fire
results.overview: Jason Jessee goes to jail and dreams of shredding the gnar.

results.title: Earth, Wind and Fire Oakland CA
results.original_title: Earth, Wind and Fire Oakland CA
results.overview: Recorded live at the Oakland Coliseum in 1981, this brilliant performance by the Grammy-winning flamboyant funk group captures the hard-driving rhythms, the soothing melodies, the scintillating horns and the special effects that have dazzled concertgoers around the world. Included are "Sing a Song," "Fantasy," "Shining Star," "Kalimba Tree," "Let Your Feelings Show," "In the Stone" and "Phoenix Intro."

results.title: Arcade Fire- MTV World Stage 2010
results.original_title: Arcade Fire- MTV World Stage 2010

results.title: Firefighter George & Fire Engines Volume 1
results.original_title: Firefighter George & Fire Engines Volume 1
results.overview: Every boy and girl dreams about the thrill of riding on a fire engine and using a firefighter's special gear.  Our video will let your little ones live this dream and learn about fire safety and fire equipment with Firefighter George and Firefighter Christy of Start Smarter.  Come along with us in our first of two exciting and action packed videos as we teach your Junior Firefighters all about the equipment on a Fire Engine.  Then watch as real firefighters show how the equipment works in live action!

results.title: Flaming Fire Chief
results.original_title: Brand-Børge rykker ud
results.overview: A festive crime comedy about a confused innkeeper who involuntarily finds himself becoming entangled in a larger crime-affair where the villains have stolen and smuggled a precious diamond baked in a cake ...
